title: Step Configuration
description: Event step configuration for setting feeding reminders and welcome notes.

title: Event Subscription
description: Subscribes to 'py.feeding.reminder.enqueued' to trigger the background job.

title: Event Handler
description: Processes the enqueued event to calculate and set the next feeding time, add notes, and update pet status.

title: Pet Update Logic
description: Updates the pet record with the calculated next feeding time, welcome note, and quarantine status.

title: Logging
description: Structured logging for tracking the reminder setup process and any errors.

title: Pet Not Found Handling
description: Handles cases where the pet specified in the event is not found in the store.
